summary: Makes items level up with you! You are no longer punished for completing quests at a low level.
descriptionHtml:
[b]= Description =[/b]
This mod will check to see if you have leveled to a point where you would have received a better version of a reward, and will swap the item with the better one. Items now level up with you! Well, some of them at least.

Currently the mod will check when you load a game (you can turn this feature on/off) or when you press a certain key (configurable or disable-able in the ini file). By default the key is the coma/less than key.

[b]= Requirements =[/b]
This plugin requires [url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon]Script Dragon[/url] in order to function.

[b]= Installation =[/b]
Copy the .asi and .ini file into your <skyrim>\\asi folder, NOT into your data folder.
That\'s it!

[b]= Uninstalling =[/b]
Delete scaleQuestRewards.asi and scaleQuestRewards.ini from the install directory.

[b]= Frequently Asked Questions =[/b]
Q: Is Script Dragon/this mod compatible with Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)?
A: Yes, 100%. Keep in mind that this mod requires Script Dragon, not SKSE.

Q: This mod doesn\'t work!
A: Post in the comments and I\'ll try to help you. Please post the version of Skyrim you are using, the version of the mod that you are using (please update to the latest! Redownload if you are unsure), and any relevant information.

[b]= Credits =[/b]
Alexander Blade, for authoring Script Dragon.
The editors at UESP for a list of the leveled items.

[b]= Contact =[/b]
NullCascade on the [url=http://www.bethsoft.com/bgsforums]Bethesda forums[/url] or Lordrea on the Nexus sites. Please let me know of any bugs or improvements.

[b]= Source =[/b]
All of my modifications are released under public domain, except where another\'s code is embedded. If you have a question, please feel free to contact me.

The source files can be found at [url=https://github.com/NullCascade/Null-s-Elder-Scrolls-Modifications]my GitHub page[/url].

[b]= Change Log =[/b]
1.0 - Initial release.
1.1 - Made the key pressing safe. It no longer triggers in menus or while typing enchantment names.
1.2 - Recompiled with optimization. No function changes.
author: NullCascade
